name: Saint Clare
summary: Saint Alphonse de Clare is an Acadian community in the Canadian province of Nova Scotia, located in the District of Clare in Digby County. Formerly Chéticamp-de-Clare, the name was changed because there is another Chéticamp in Nova Scotia on Cape Breton.
biography: Saint Alphonse de Clare is an Acadian community in the Canadian province of Nova Scotia, located in the District of Clare in Digby County. Formerly Chéticamp-de-Clare, the name was changed because there is another Chéticamp in Nova Scotia on Cape Breton. The similar names caused confusion for postal and other services.
